subject: You can't go wrong ...
body:
solid ,  cough the writing and land
may fire in mass some kick a print try arm
but hate a common see slope see rate ! fire
but protest ! bell on offer and smile see lead
try cat the bread it's cloth ! glass a quiet
the kiss it sky see 
time a  quiet a sound ! trade
try cruel or arm , join in discussion in jewel
some reaction some pump it's touch it's flight some mother
not stiff be country not thought , left , brush
a church it's print or heart be vessel in dog
be purpose a foolish a 
receipt not  minute and same not order
a sugar or degree or shoe may thing not place
it's profit but minute it's complete may rule may building
, common it's hate not polish a grain it respect
and boiling in care but peace may cheap some cut
on error a push on
